Module kivakit.filesystems.hdfs
Package com.telenav.kivakit.filesystems.hdfs

Class HdfsFolder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.telenav.kivakit.filesystems.hdfs.HdfsFolder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FileSystemObjectService, FolderService, ByteSized, ModificationTimestamped, ResourcePathed
    public class HdfsFolder
extends java.lang.Object
implements FolderService
    Not public API

    Implementation of FolderService used to provide HdfsFileSystemService.

    Author:
    jonathanl (shibo)
